description: Five Psychological Enhancers (canonical IDs) for the Universal Brand System

enhancers.name: Scarcity
enhancers.definition: Genuine limitation of availability to compress time delay.
enhancers.permitted_when: Supply is actually limited or capacity is real.

enhancers.name: Urgency
enhancers.definition: Real deadlines that change outcome if missed.
enhancers.permitted_when: There is a genuine deadline or time-based consequence.

enhancers.name: Bonuses
enhancers.definition: Additions that increase dream outcome without adding effort.
enhancers.permitted_when: Bonuses are real and remove friction or risk.
enhancers.forbidden_when: Bonuses are filler or inflate complexity.

enhancers.name: Guarantees
enhancers.definition: Risk reversal that increases perceived likelihood.

enhancers.name: Naming
enhancers.definition: Strategic naming that clarifies and positions the offer.
enhancers.permitted_when: Name is clear, ownable, and true.
